name: VIDEO: County COVID-19 Vaccinations Shift into High Gear
description: The push is on in the County of San Diego to vaccinate for COVID-19 as quickly as possible.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
The push is on in the County of San Diego to vaccinate for COVID-19 as quickly as possible. With hospitals at critical care capacity, health care providers spread thin and record-breaking infection rates, lives hang in the balance. Innovation and collaboration have led to exciting progress in delivering thousands of doses to top tier recipients. And each vaccine offers a little shot of hope that this pandemic will soon be behind us.
For more information about COVID-19, testing locations and vaccine distribution, visit www.coronavirus-sd.com.
